title: bryant.coleman
author: bryant.coleman
content: I was just checking some of the tokens in my wallet, and incidentally found that I have close to a million "old" KICK tokens, that were credited almost 5 years back. Token contract is: 0xC12D1c73eE7DC3615BA4e37E4ABFdbDDFA38907EI just searched and found that the old tokens were swapped with new ones sometime back, but I didn't got any of them credited to my account. My question hereÂ  is whether all these tokens in my wallet are worthless, or is it possible to convert them to ETH or BTC?

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Yeah all of your kick tokens are worthless.Here's why. You were airdropped with frozen drop tokens which can be unlocked as long as a few criterias would be meet. You can read more https://hackernoon.com/how-to-unlock-your-888888-kicktokens-from-frozendrop-ohj3z951The problem is kick already stopped this program since 2021. The unfrozen page to unfrozen your tokens has also been stopped since 2021.https://kickex.com/en/token-unfreeze
